dialogue: Hey, I'm Skyler! Congratulations on defeating Boarman! You have gained valuable experience. Don't forget to spend your dinero to level up your abilities!

options.text: I won't forget to spend my dinero! Is there anything else you can tell me?

dialogue: Things have been bad to the bone since Zuckerborg came to Code Platoonia. I've been busy fighting skeletons in the area and I need your help!
